11.01.2024 13:23
Grandpa's death was reported by her granddaughter Solomon. The artist died in her sleep. There was a daughter next to him.

11.01.2024 12:31
On 13 January, at 21.00 a.m., the TNT starts the second season of the Confette music show.

Putin explained the price of eggs in Russia

11.01.2024 09:39
According to Putin, because of a small increase in incomes, citizens began to acquire eggs, chicken meat. The state didn't open import in time, the prices went up.
